value:
Let's skip the formalities, shall we?
Care for a drink?

Risking your life is part of the job for
a mercenary. It's smart to keep your
eyes on what's in front of you.

There is only so much guidance I can
give. Sometimes all you can do is
watch the young surpass you.

It's all a bit reckless if you ask me.
I just hope my counsel about Lady
Rhea left some impression...

I have no intention of getting overly
involved—for our mutual benefit.

You're $Nu, huh?
That right?

The battlefield is no place for idle
thoughts. The fight is all you should
think about—if you want to survive.

I'm gonna get myself cleaned up,
all right, $Nu?
Damn... Am I losing my edge?

Huh... Interesting. I hadn't imagined
I'd still be finding ways to improve
myself at this point.

I'm Jeralt. I'm a mercenary, so I can
handle myself in a fight. If you don't
mind, why don't we leave it at that.

Damn, nothing like a cool drink after
a long battle...$k$pSo? What was it you wanted to ask
me about?$k$pRight... My full name is Jeralt Reus
Eisner. I was once captain of the
Knights of Seiros.$k$pYou've done your research.$k$pLady Rhea saved my life once, and
I ended up in her service.$k$pAnd I am also the father of the
Ashen Demon. My life is a long,
complicated story. Too long...$k$pSo long that I've grown a bit weary
of it—all the fighting, the struggling
to create a life...$k$pThe world is full of secrets that no
one needs to know. And once you've
made the mistake of learning...$k$pI can tell you that there are truths
about the world more terrible than
any could imagine.$k$pEven so, if you choose to seek out
those truths, I won't be the one to
try to stop you.
I will break you!
Outmatched.
Your guard's down.
No escape.
Damn... Am I losing my edge?
Name's Jeralt. These days I'm just a wandering mercenary.
Hm? Did you need something? I'm a little busy.
Risking your life is part of the job for a mercenary like me.
I tried to teach that kid everything I know.
I used to be a Knight of Seiros, but that was a long time ago.
Lady Rhea's here too, huh? I guess there's no avoiding it then...
You've come a long way since we met, but I still have a lot to teach if you'll listen.
Move out!
What's the plan?
Now's the time.
